hooks.command: bash -lc "SCRIPT=\"$CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT/hooks/scripts/stop-watcher.sh\"; SCRIPT=\${SCRIPT//\\\\/\\/}; if printf '%s' \"$SCRIPT\" | grep -Eq '^[A-Za-z]:/'; then DRIVE=$(printf '%s' \"$SCRIPT\" | cut -c1 | tr 'A-Z' 'a-z'); SCRIPT=\"/$DRIVE/\${SCRIPT:3}\"; fi; if [ -f \"$SCRIPT\" ]; then \"$SCRIPT\"; else echo \"CEO Ralph cleanup: stop hook script not found\"; fi"
